name: FORCE 2
description:
FORCE is a 2-4 player arena-style fighting game in which you can only kill your opponents via the environment. To play, you will need at least one friend, at least two Xbox controllers, and a Windows PC.  Each character has unique abilities, and there are many ways to die, including by your own hand. For example: 

  • Walls break and become deadly
  • Lasers will push you into said walls
  • Rocks are deadly and break walls
  • And more fun surprises!

Play some rounds in the arena- the first player to 5 or 9 points will win the match. 

Playable Characters Include (Updated 2.0):

  • Bahm - drops bombs which explode after a few seconds and create shrapnel, along with dealing knockback.
  • Layzur - deploys a rotating laser which shoves players on contact, disappears after some time.
  • Spyk - becomes spikey, and other players will stick to him on contact for a short duration.
  • Rahk - launches a rock, which bounces off walls (and damages them in the process). It is destroyed when it hits a fully broken wall.
  • Boomer - applies knockback to anyone in range
  • Rang - Throws a boomerang that knocks players around and breaks walls
  • Gunnee - shoots fast and deadly bullets that break walls
